files.patch:
@@ -579,7 +579,7 @@
-			".begin: syscall\n\t"
-      "mov (%%rsi), %%ecx\n\t"
-      "test %%ecx, %%ecx\n\t"
-      "jnz .begin\n\t"
-			: // ignore return value
-			: "a"(SYS_futex), "D"(FUTEX_WAIT_PRIVATE), "S"(&persist_futex), "d"(1)
-			: "memory", "cc", "rcx", "r11");
+    ".begin: syscall\n\t"
+    "mov (%%rsi), %%ecx\n\t"
+    "test %%ecx, %%ecx\n\t"
+    "jnz .begin\n\t"
+    : // ignore return value
+    : "a"(SYS_futex), "D"(FUTEX_WAIT_PRIVATE), "S"(&persist_futex), "d"(1)
+    : "memory", "cc", "rcx", "r11");
@@ -592,6 +592,6 @@
-			".begin: svc #0\n\t"
-      "ldr w3, [x1]\n\t"
-      "cbnz w3, .begin\n\t"
-			: // ignore return value
-			: "r"(sysnum), "r"(op), "r"(futex), "r"(value)
-			: "memory", "cc", "x3");
+    ".begin: svc #0\n\t"
+    "ldr w3, [x1]\n\t"
+    "cbnz w3, .begin\n\t"
+    : // ignore return value
+    : "r"(sysnum), "r"(op), "r"(futex), "r"(value)
+    : "memory", "cc", "x3");
